refnamediv.refpurpose: obtain a pointer to an OpenGL or GLX function

listitem.para: Specifies the name of the OpenGL or GLX function whose address is to be returned.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: glXGetProcAddress returns the address of the function specified in procName. This is necessary in environments where the OpenGL link library exports a different set of functions than the runtime library.

refsect1.title: Notes
refsect1.para: A NULL pointer is returned if function requested is not suported in the implementation being queried.
GLU functions are not queryable due to the fact that the library may not be loaded at the time of the query.
